string-array.item: Want a nice refreshing drink that involves ice and coffee? This recipe is for you! It's quick, easy, budget-friendly, and tastes just like the gourmet coffee-shops, if not better!
Tired of hot chocolate? Look no more! This is the BEST french vanilla recipe that you will ever find in your entire life.
Have you ever tried milk with tea? This recipe is PERFECT. Just add milk, earl grey tea bag, water, and you're good to go!
